duties_responsibilities.duty: Proactively contact contractors, specifying engineers, and end-users to develop long-term relationships and generate sales prospects.
Provide quotations to customers and coordinate equipment purchases with vendors.
Process necessary paperwork for vendors and customers to ensure smooth transactions.
Assess customer needs for the sale of various products, including boilers, burners, and other heat-producing equipment.
Provide boiler sizing and application support as needed, seeking necessary training to become proficient.

education_certification.credential: Secondary Degree in related field or equivalent work experience. Valid driver's license is required.
